类 Lock

java.lang.Object
  Lock

public class Lock
extends java.lang.Object

作者：
Administrator

构造方法摘要
Lock(java.lang.String lockFile, boolean isShared)
           
Lock(java.lang.String lockFile, boolean isShared, long lockStart, long lockSize)
          Create a File Lock
 
方法摘要
 int lock()
          Lock filelock
 int unlock()
          unlock filelock
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

Lock

public Lock(java.lang.String lockFile,
            boolean isShared)

Lock

public Lock(java.lang.String lockFile,
            boolean isShared,
            long lockStart,
            long lockSize)
Create a File Lock

参数：
lockFile - File used to create a file lock
isShared - true=shared,false=private
lockStart - start position of filelock
lockSize - end position of filelock
方法详细信息

lock

public int lock()
Lock filelock

返回：
0:success,-1:fails

unlock

public int unlock()
unlock filelock

返回：
0:success,-1:fails
